ISSUE.TITLE: exp not working after initial auth w/ github enterprise [0.3]
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: After authorizing against github enterprise I am redirected to a blank page with the following log (with actual code and state of course) ``` 2014/10/09 00:01:59.800599 [47744fe7df1d/brZBwyUGPx-000025] Started GET "/api/auth/enterprise.github.com?code=yyyy&state=xxxx" from 10.0.2.2:63002 2014/10/09 00:01:59.800654 [47744fe7df1d/brZBwyUGPx-000025] Returning 400 in 37.051us ``` This looks like the same error I was receiving when trying to use 0.3 against github.com without a verified email. Is there something looking for specifically a verified email? /user/emails is sending back a valid email, but verified is set to false.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix multiple event streams bug and only open logs stream if step open (#525)
